name: The College Keys (Tom Burt)
description:
This game was created in 2015 with the proposal to create a game to show ESOL (English for speakers of other languages) students around Plymouth as many of them had never been before. This game was sent into a completion and won the main prize.  This game was created by four people in a team including myself (Tom Burt) and we called ourselves "Team Jam".

We initially planned the game to be much bigger, but due to time restrictions this was the best we could create. Thanks for playing.

 

NOTE SOME OF THE BUILDINGS HAVE LOST THEIR INITAL TEXTURES
